org.apache.oozie.service
Class ConfigurationService

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.oozie.service.ConfigurationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service, Instrumentable
public class ConfigurationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service, Instrumentable

Built in service that initializes the services configuration.

The configuration loading sequence is identical to Hadoop configuration loading sequence.

First the default values are loaded from the DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE, then the site configured values are loaded from the site configuration file.

The DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE is always loaded from the classpath root.

The site configuration file and loading location is determined as follow:

The site configuration file name is set by the system property CONFIG_FILE. The default value is SITE_CONFIG_FILE.

The site configuration file is loaded from the directory specified by the system property CONFIG_PATH. If not set, no site configuration is loaded.

Configuration properties, prefixed with 'oozie.', passed as system properties overrides default and site values.

The configuration service logs details on how the configuration was loaded as well as what properties were overriden via system properties settings.
